title: Selling a couple of recently graded SGC A’s
author: Mantle77CA

posts.post_title: Selling a couple of recently graded SGC A’s
posts.post_content:
Couple of recently graded T206 A’s for sale:

Piedmont 350/25 Art Fletcher - SOLD
Piedmont 150 George Stovall - $140
Sweet Caporal Clark Griffith 350/25 - $250

Both present really well.  Prices include shipping.
Bump - Fletcher sold, but added a Clark Griffith SC.
